property.name: Rules
property.value: {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ This creature gets +1000 power for each card in your hand. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may jokers tornado. If you do, draw a card. {JOKERS TORNADO} Return one of your other Jokers to your hand

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, Gacharange Summon. ({GACHARANGE SUMMON}: Summon the top card of your super gacharange with its cost paid.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may jokers tornado. If you do, this creature gets +2000 power, "double breaker" and can't be blocked until the end of the turn. {JOKERS TORNADO} Return one of your other Jokers to your hand

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 2 cards of your deck and put one on the bottom of your deck. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Mana Drive 2 (Jokers): When you put this creature, if you have 2 or more cards in your mana zone and at least one of them is Jokers, put a Jokers from your graveyard into your mana zone. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-13 Super GR Mega Start Deck: Joe's Super Jokers Tornado

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, if you have a total of 3 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it on the bottom of their deck. Then draw a card.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-13 Super GR Mega Start Deck: Joe's Super Jokers Tornado

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may jokers tornado. If you do, draw 2 cards. {JOKERS TORNADO} Return one of your other Jokers to your hand ■ If you have 5 or more cards in your hand, this creature can't be attacked or blocked.

property.value: DMSD-13 Super GR Mega Start Deck: Joe's Super Jokers Tornado

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature or one of your other creatures is returned to your hand from the battle zone, gacharange summon. ({GACHARANGE SUMMON}: Summon the top card of your super gacharange with its cost paid.)
